domainTerms.description: Sustainable development, responsible business, and environmental impact.
Principles and processes of circular economy, life cycle assessment, recycling, and resource valorisation.
Business model design, initiative, risk evaluation, and social entrepreneurship.
Green technologies, ecological footprint, and environmentally sustainable product development.
Environmental, Social, and Governance frameworks, reporting, and strategic importance.
Sustainable management, change management, team leadership, and organizational development.
Financial accounting, sustainable financial management, investment projects, and financial analysis.
Marketing management, e-marketing, market research, and strategic positioning.
Data analysis, statistics, and decision-making processes.
Information and communication technology skills, digital technologies, and algorithmic thinking.
Supply chain activities, sustainable supply chain management, and reducing carbon footprint.
Environmental legislation, impact assessment, and carbon footprint reduction.
Governance structures, stakeholder roles, and sustainable growth strategies.
